name: Spicy Maryland Crab Dip
author: Laura Superczynski
summary: A delicious hot crab and cheese dip that comes straight from the heart of the Chesapeake Bay! Serve with crackers or a warm baguette.
ingredients: Old Bay Seasoning TM to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Lightly grease a 1 quart baking dish
In a medium bowl, mix cream cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, garlic powder and about 2 tablespoons of the Cheddar cheese
Fold in crabmeat, hot sauce and 2 tablespoons seafood seasoning
Transfer the mixture to the prepared baking dish
Top with remaining Cheddar cheese and seafood seasoning
Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until bubbly and lightly browned
